overview.en: Insight Chain, a decentralized research ecosystem chain based on blockchain, will focus on data ecosystem on the blockchain domain firstly, works on building Wall Street-like financial order in the blockchain domain. It integrates companies, media, analyst and investor with blockchain technology, co-constructs a decentralized platform integrating information sharing, review & index, data trading and interaction based on research to promote the upgrade and healthy development of the blockchain industry.
overview.zh: Insight Chain是全球首个基于区块链的去中心化调研生态链，致力于解决调研过程中效率低、成本高、数据不真实、数据链条太长的问题，以【调研即挖矿】为切入点，实现调研数据上链、调研数据价值回归个人、调研大数据。已上线链上首款调研应用：Insight，以加密数字货币的去中心化调研评级为切入点，通过区块链技术将项目方、分析师、交易所、投资者进行整合，共建集评级指数、数据交易、信息共享、互动咨询于一体的去中心化社区调研平台。
